name: Toughness
description: You can withstand more punishment than most before succumbing. Increase your maximum Hit Points by your level. The DC of recovery checks is equal to 9 + your dying condition value.

name: Fleet
description: You move more quickly on foot. Your Speed increases by 5 feet.

name: Incredible Initiative
description: You react more quickly than others. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.

name: Shield Block
description: You snap your shield in place to ward off a blow. Your shield prevents you from taking an amount of damage up to the shield's Hardness. You and the shield each take any remaining damage, possibly breaking or destroying the shield.

name: Armor Proficiency
description: You become trained in light armor. If you already were trained in light armor, you gain training in medium armor. If you were trained in both, you become trained in heavy armor.

name: Weapon Proficiency
description: You become trained in all simple weapons. If you were already trained in all simple weapons, you become trained in all martial weapons. If you were already trained in all martial weapons, you become trained in one advanced weapon of your choice.

name: Diehard
description: It takes more to kill you than most. You die from the dying condition at dying 5, rather than dying 4.

name: Fast Recovery
description: Your body quickly recovers from afflictions. You regain twice as many Hit Points from resting. Each time you succeed at a Fortitude save against an ongoing disease or poison, you reduce its stage by 2, or by 1 against a virulent disease or poison. Each critical success you achieve against an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 against a virulent disease or poison.

name: Feather Step
description: You step carefully and quickly. You can Step into difficult terrain.

name: Ride
description: When you command your mount to move, you automatically succeed at the check to Command an Animal. You don't need to attempt a check to remain mounted in normal circumstances, though you still need to attempt checks when the situation is more challenging (such as when your mount is Panicked).

name: Adopted Ancestry
description: You were raised by a family of a different ancestry than your own, and you have access to that ancestry's ancestry feats. Choose an ancestry. You can select ancestry feats from the ancestry you chose, in addition to your own ancestry's feats.

name: Breath Control
description: You have incredible breath control, which grants you advantages when living without air. You can hold your breath for 25 times as long as usual before suffocating. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against inhaled threats, such as inhaled poisons, and if you roll a success on such a saving throw, you get a critical success instead.

name: Recognize Spell
description: If you are trained in the appropriate skill for the spell's tradition and it's a common spell of 2nd level or lower, you automatically recognize it (you still roll to attempt to get a critical success, but you can't get a worse result than success). The highest-level spell you automatically recognize increases to 4th if you're an expert, 6th if you're a master, and 10th if you're legendary.
prerequisites: Trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion

name: Quick Repair
description: You take 1 minute to Repair an item instead of taking 10 minutes. If you're a master in Crafting, it takes 3 actions. If you're legendary, it takes 1 action.

name: Thorough Search
description: You take your time to thoroughly search an area. When you Search, you can take twice as long to search an area to gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the Perception check. Any traps or hazards found this way also grant you a +2 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll if combat breaks out.

name: Keen Follower
description: You can follow a skilled tracker at full speed. When Tracking, you can move at full Speed while following the tracks of a creature tracked by an ally who has a higher proficiency rank in Survival than you.

name: Additional Lore
description: Your knowledge has expanded to encompass a new field. Choose an additional Lore skill subcategory. You become trained in it. At 3rd, 7th, and 15th levels, you gain an additional skill increase you can apply only to the chosen Lore subcategory.

name: Combat Climber
description: Your training has taught you to climb in combat conditions. You're not flat-footed while Climbing, and you can Climb with a hand occupied by a weapon or shield. You must still use another hand and both legs to Climb.

name: Prescient Planner
description: You regularly account for the unexpected. You can spend 1 minute to retrieve an item you previously purchased but didn't record as having on your person. The item must be common, must cost no more than 1 gp, and must be a piece of adventuring gear.

name: Ancestral Paragon
description: Whether through instinct, study, or magic, you feel a deeper connection to your ancestry. You gain a 1st-level ancestry feat.

name: Untrained Improvisation
description: You've learned how to handle situations requiring skills you haven't formally trained in. Your proficiency bonus to untrained skill checks is equal to half your level instead of +0. If you're level 7 or higher, the bonus equals your full level instead.

name: Canny Acumen
description: Your avoidance or observation is beyond the pale. Choose Fortitude saves, Reflex saves, Will saves, or Perception. You become an expert in your choice. At 17th level, you become a master in your choice.

name: Skill Training
description: You become trained in the skill of your choice.

name: Intimidating Prowess
description: In situations where you can physically menace the target when you Demoralize, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Intimidation check and a +2 circumstance bonus if you're a master. If the creature is a lower Strength modifier than you, you gain the bonus regardless.

name: Expeditious Search
description: You have a system that lets you search at great speed. You can Search at half the normal speed. If you're a master in Perception, you can Search at full Speed instead.

name: Battle Cry
description: When you roll initiative, you can yell a mighty battle cry and attempt to Demoralize an observed foe as a free action. If you're legendary in Intimidation, you can use a reaction to Demoralize your foe when you critically succeed at an attack roll.

name: Legendary Negotiation
description: You can negotiate incredibly quickly in dire situations. You attempt to Make an Impression and then Request a cease-fire or similar agreement as a single 3-action activity. If you fail the Make an Impression, you still attempt the Request.

name: Incredible Investiture
description: You have an incredible ability to invest more magic items. Increase your limit on invested magic items from 10 to 12.

name: True Perception
description: Your eyes are keen beyond those of most mortals. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek hidden or undetected creatures within 30 feet of you.

name: Legendary Survivalist
description: You can survive indefinitely without food or water, and you can go without air for 10 minutes without suffocating. If you're legendary in Survival, your expertise keeps you alive in the harshest conditions.
